prompts: Create a graceful fire-type Pokemon that gallops through the fields with a mane of flames.
Imagine a shiny version of Ponyta, with vibrant purple flames and a sparkling coat.
Design a Pokemon that resembles Ponyta but has a more mystical, ethereal appearance.
Generate a fire-type Pokemon with a glowing tail and an aura of heat around it.
Show me a Ponyta reimagined as a legendary creature with a dazzling array of colors.
Make a Ponyta that can harness the power of the sun, with golden flames and a radiant shine.
Give me a description of Ponyta’s fire abilities, perfect for battling in open terrains.
